ksa_organization.name: Kenya Scouts Association
ksa_organization.chief_commissioner: Hon. Julius Ole Sunkuli EGH, EBS, MP

ksa_mission.primary_goal: Develop character and provide young people with skills to be better people and better citizens
three_principles: Service to country and to others
Service to self through good character
ksa_mission.philosophy: Scouting is the world's largest single voluntary youth movement dedicated to building character
ksa_mission.kenyanization: Scouting adapted to Kenyan culture, national goals and aspirations

ksa_founder.name: Lord Baden-Powell
ksa_founder.military_service: British Army - India and South Africa
ksa_founder.key_achievement: Siege of Mafeking - survived 7 months without losing troops
ksa_founder.zulu_name: Impesa - the wolf that does not sleep
ksa_founder.founder_day: February 22 (shared with wife Lady Baden-Powell - Thinking Day for Girl Guides)

sungura.name: Sungura Scouts
sungura.link_badge: Going Up Ceremony to next section

jasiri.name: Jasiri Scouts
awards_and_badges: Chief Commissioner's Challenge Badge (C.C.C) - Leadership challenge
Jasiri Drug Abuse Prevention - Health advocacy
Jasiri Reproductive Health Education - Health education

core_principles: Service to country and to others
scout_promise_and_law.scout_method: Learning by doing, age-appropriate challenges, outdoor activities
scout_promise_and_law.integration_policy: Equal participation for all - girls, boys, and differently-abled scouts

shop_products.note: KSA Scouts Shop - Price List Effective 1st January 2025

categories.uniforms: Scout uniforms for all sections with official badges
categories.badges: Standard badges, proficiency badges, and special achievement badges
categories.training_materials: Handbooks, training guides, and educational resources
categories.camping_gear: Tents, sleeping bags, and outdoor equipment
categories.accessories: Scarves, neckerchiefs, belts, and uniform accessories

training_and_development.wood_badge: Advanced leadership training for Scout Leaders
training_and_development.investiture_process: Formal ceremony marking entry into each Scout section
training_and_development.badge_requirements: Tests designed to suit age and ability of each section
training_and_development.programme_philosophy: Supplemented by Scout literature and Leader creativity
training_and_development.adaptations: Severely handicapped scouts may need modified requirements - contact HQ

funders: United Nations International Drug Control Programme (UNDCP)
National Agency for Campaign Against Drug Abuse (NACADA)
Programme for Appropriate Technology in Health (PATH)

ai_assistant_guidelines.purpose: Help visitors understand KSA programs, shop products, badge requirements, and scout opportunities
ai_assistant_guidelines.language: Use both English and Swahili where appropriate (e.g., 'Kuwa Tayari' = 'Be Prepared')
ai_assistant_guidelines.scope: Products, programs, contact info, history, values, and scout development
ai_assistant_guidelines.limitations: Refer complex administrative questions to HQ email or phone
